text:
Producer!
Thanks for your hard work!

Oh, Meguru.
Good job on the lesson!

Hey, is there still time?
I want to practice a little more on my own!

I want to review the lesson and
keep my body moving!

Oh, there's plenty of time, but...
Aren't you tired?

Nah! Maybe it's because of the training camp?
I'm so full of energy, like 'Boom!'!

Haha, 'Boom!' huh?
You're even more energetic than usual.

It's not just that!
The training camp feels like a sleepover, so much fun!
We chat and play games all the time."

Yeah, I'm glad you're enjoying it, but
don't forget to take care of your health.

Oh, of course!
I know that lessons come first...

And even though it's like a sleepover,
we're not staying up late or anything!
I get sleepy quickly at night...

Haha, that's a good thing.
Better to be healthy than sleep-deprived.

Hehe, yeah, you're right!
But I'm full of energy in the morning instead!

Yeah, working hard during the day
and resting well at night is the best.

Counting on you to keep that energy up
for the rest of the camp!
Yeah, you can count on me, Producer!
